g.text: Ask HumanPlayer if he wants to play
Check if HumanPlayer still has money
reset hand of HumanPlayer and dealer
ask HumanPlayer/dealer if he wants to hit
decide if dealer needs to hit
ask HumanPlayer if he wants to play
hold the pack with which currently is played
reinitialize the pack if there are less than 100 cards
Hold the list of card for a player
print the cards to the console
generate a Deck of all possible cards
